reference.title: What happens after you change your password
reference.shortdesc: Explains how the change password takes effect

section.p: If you change or reset your password, youâ€™ll be signed out everywhere except:

ul.li: Devices you use to verify that it's you when you sign in.

Some devices with third-party apps to which you've given account access.
Learn how to remove an app's access to your account.Learn how to remove an app's access to your account.

Helpful home devices that you've given account access.
Learn how to unlink these devices from your Google Account
